text: Mocha is a city in Yemen. As of 2021, about 10,000 people lived there. It is also known as Al-Makha. From the 15th to the 18th century, it was the main city, where coffee was traded. Mocha was also the main port city for Yemen's capital, Sana'a. In recent times, the ports of Aden and Al Hudaydah have become more important. Category:Cities in Yemen
title: Mocha, Yemen
